title: Goods receipt create-goods-receipt-for-supplier-order payload
description: POST request payload for api route _action/pickware-erp/goods-receipt/create-goods-receipt-for-supplier-order

goodsReceiptId.description: The future id of the goods receipt to be created. Used as an idempotency key.

lineItemQuantities.description: A mapping of supplier order line item ids to the quantities that should be written in the goods receipt. Must contain a value for every supplier order line item.
